name: Next of Sin
description:
Next of Sin is a University project made for the CIU211 Unit at SAE Institute. The purpose of this was to convey a meaning or point of view in regards to mediated violence. As a gaming student, my team and I find the media portrays games as this huge influencer in real world violence when evidence supports violent games as a stress reliever and a source of anger management. We decided to make a violent game and have our classmates play it to see if they got more violent to reiterate our point of view in a more creative fasion than a video explaining the facts. The end resulted in no one being influenced in any way by playing it hence communicating our point nicely. 

**This is an unfinished Game**

**It will not be iterated on further**

In Game Instructions:

- Press WASD to move.

- Press E to Interact.

- Press "MouseButton1" / "LeftMoustButton" to Swing Axe.

- Press "P" to end the game. We did not finish the timer or body count list to present the game over menu screen.
